-- VHDL Configuration
-- Concurrent Signal Assignment: When
-- Concurrent Signal Assgnments are done outside of process blocks

-- Generic Syntax
<SIGNAL_NAME1> <= <VALUE1> when <CONDITION1> else
		       <VALUE2> when <CONDITION2> else
		       <VALUE3>;

-- Specific example usage of when
value <= "110" when count = 0 else
     "000" when count = 1 else
     "110" when count = 2 else
     "100" when count = 3 else
     "010" when count = 4 else
     "110";
